snippet: Caught between the Kurds' lucrative regional contracts and the Iraqi government's ire, Exxon Mobil bows out of a big field, Iraq's Deputy Prime Minister announced at the Oil and Money Conference.
abstract: Caught between the Kurds' lucrative regional contracts and the Iraqi government's ire, Exxon Mobil bows out of a big field, Iraq's Deputy Prime Minister announced at the Oil and Money Conference.

headline.main: Oil Fight Between Baghdad and Kurds Comes to London
